ValidationRule.description: If Area of Focus is Toolbar Support other fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ISPICKVAL(Area_of_Focus__c,'Toolbar Support'), ( ISBLANK( Outlook_Version__c ) || ISBLANK( Operating_System__c ) || ISBLANK( Exchange_Version__c ) || ISPICKVAL( Issue_Replicated_in_OWA__c , '') || ISBLANK( Internet_Explorer_Version__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If your Area of Focus is Toolbar Support, then you must populate a value in the following fields: Outlook Version, Operating System, Exchange Version, Issue Replicated in OWA, and Internet Explorer Version.
